Author: Windesign
Description: Find which 4×4 pattern exists in a 6×6 grid of LEDs. Tags: left-arrow, right-arrow, up-arrow, down-arrow, rotate, letter, 9-button
Name: Grid Matching

TwitchPlays.HelpText: !{0} left/right/up/down/clockwise/counter-clockwise/submit | !{0} l/r/u/d/cw/ccw/s | !{0} set d [set letter] | !{0} 'd' [set letter] | All of these can be chained, e.g. !{0} up right right clockwise 'd' submit
